LanguageData.RWBY_Myrtenaster_Melee.label: 柳葉白菀
LanguageData.RWBY_Myrtenaster_Melee.description: 柳葉白菀是Weiss Schnee的招牌武器。 It is a Multi Action Dust Rapier (MADR) that seems to act as a focus or source for Weiss' power.
